contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox brewery | name = Zagrebačka pivovara | image = [[Image:Zagrebacka pivovara logo.png|220px]] | caption = | location = [[Zagreb]], [[Croatia]] | owner = [[CVC Capital Partners]] | opened = {{Start date|1892}} | production = 1.7 million hl | url = {{URL|www.ozujsko.com}} | active_beers = {{brewbox_beer|name=[[Ožujsko]] |style=[[Pilsner]]}} {{brewbox_beer|name=Tomislav |style=[[Porter (beer)|Porter]]}} {{brewbox_beer|name=Ožujsko Cool |style=[[Low-alcohol beer|Non-alcoholic]]}} | seasonal_beers = {{brewbox_beer|name=Božićno (Winter) |style=Christmas [[Pilsner]]}} | other_beers = }} [[File:Zagrebačka pivovara - ulaz Ilica.jpg|thumb|250px|Main entrance ([[Ilica (street)|Ilica]], Zagreb)]] '''Zagrebačka pivovara''' is a [[brewery]] in [[Zagreb]], [[Croatia]], founded in 1892 and later was purchased by [[Samuel David Alexander]] who become the major shareholder. In 1994, multinational beverage company [[InBev]] acquired a significant share.<ref>http://www.ozujsko.com/pivovara</ref> In mid October 2009, [[private equity fund]] [[CVC Capital Partners]] bought all of [[Anheuser–Busch InBev]]'s holdings in Central Europe for [[€]]2.23 billion. They renamed the operations StarBev.<ref>[http://www.b92.net/biz/vesti/srbija.php?yyyy=2009&mm=10&dd=15&nav_id=386791 Apatinska pivara prodata CVC-u, B92, October 15, 2009]</ref> It also produces [[Stella Artois]], [[Beck's]], [[Staropramen]] and [[Carling]] under license for the local market. They produce following brands of beer: * Božićno pivo/ Christmas beer (seasonal only) * [[Ožujsko]] * Ožujsko Cool (non-alcoholic) * Ožujsko Izzy * Ožujsko Strong * Tomislav * Fresssh (5 percent alcohol) ==External links== * [http://www.ozujsko.com/index.php Zagrebačka pivovara homepage] (Croatian language) * [http://www.ratebeer.com/brewers/zagrebačka-pivovara-(inbev)/1619/ Rate Beer on Zagrebačka pivovara products] ==Notes and references== {{reflist}} [[Category:Beer and breweries in Croatia]] [[Category:Companies based in Zagreb]] [[Category:Companies established in 1892]] {{beer-stub}} {{Zagreb-stub}}
